quotes.t: The wedding is mounted in traditional Punjabi style, but underneath the formal fanfare simmer dysfunctional-family tensions, deep dark secrets,  … and {qword}illicit{/qword} affairs.

"Thank you, Lieutenant," she said, bowing her head, just as she might in everyday, civilian life, and I felt suddenly {qword}illicit{/qword} in her presence, as though we'd slipped out of sight of our chaperons …
The companies that carry cellular … have adopted a number of monitoring techniques to detect {qword}illicit{/qword} calls …
